metadata.synopsis: The monitor has teleported you to a mysterious room and offered you dinner - and a deal.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to camp to Trigger first camp night- come back to level- use code: oe qnight NIGHT_MonitorIntro_a9297517-ab4d-482d-b287-fc6e7001d93e- move a distance and have supplies to trigger second camp night- Don't have Laezel in party or will trigger different cinematic- After talking with monitor in camp he will teleport you to Dinner hall for this cinematic to start

57.speaker: Raphael
57.context: NodeContext: This place is in the Hells, though Karlach doesn't realize that yet. She's put off but trying to stay cool.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I don't like this at all.
36.context: NodeContext: This place is in the Hells, though Karlach doesn't realize that yet. She's put off but trying to stay cool.

72.speaker: Karlach
72.text: I don't like this at all.
72.context: NodeContext: This place is in the Hells, though Karlach doesn't realize that yet. She's put off but trying to stay cool.

68.speaker: Player
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: He spreads his arms as he dramatically introduces this place.NodeContext: He spreads his arms as he dramatically introduces this place.

12.speaker: Player
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: He spreads his arms as he dramatically introduces this place.NodeContext: He spreads his arms as he dramatically introduces this place.

3.speaker: Raphael
3.text: The House of Hope. Where the tired come to rest, and the famished come to feed - lavishly.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: He spreads his arms as he dramatically introduces this place.NodeContext: He spreads his arms as he dramatically introduces this place.

86.speaker: Raphael
86.text: Go on. Partake. Enjoy your supper. After all...
86.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

25.speaker: Raphael
25.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: We're in the Hells, aren't we. Take me back. Now.
29.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: I will rise as a kith'rak. Your threats do not worry me.
58.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

78.speaker: Player
78.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I'm getting tired of your games.
40.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

88.speaker: Player
88.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

22.speaker: Raphael
22.text: Are you not entertained? Well - far be it from me to disappoint.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Ignore him and fill your plate.
73.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

10.speaker: Raphael
10.text: Not easily rattled, I see. Good. Makes the next part that much more straightforward.
10.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

80.text: What's better than a devil you don't know?
80.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

8.speaker: Raphael
8.text: What's better than a devil you don't know?
8.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

16.speaker: Raphael
16.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

17.speaker: Player
17.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

41.speaker: Karlach
41.context: NodeContext: Surprise, even fear in her voice. This is early in the game so she's still fresh from the hells. Referring to Raphael's first revelation of who he is.

21.speaker: Player
21.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

14.speaker: Raphael
14.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

35.speaker: Raphael
35.text: Am I a friend? Potentially. An adversary? Conceivably. But a saviour? That's for certain.
35.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I never seek help from devils.
33.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

19.speaker: Raphael
19.text: You do not seek it, but it has found you:

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Eloquent words, but I'm not seeking another pact.
63.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

1.speaker: Player
1.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

37.speaker: Raphael
37.text: Easy, easy. I'm here to help, not harm.
37.context: NodeContext: Easy, easy: take your time - he's not intimidated, almost like he's talking to an excited child

52.speaker: Raphael
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: He snaps his fingers on the word 'that'. As he does so, the candle flames suddenly shine unnaturally bright, bathing the scene in a hellish red glow.NodeContext: He snaps his fingers on the word 'that'. As he does so, the candle flames suddenly shine unnaturally bright, bathing the scene in a hellish red glow.

89.speaker: Raphael
89.text: One skull, two tenants, and no solution in sight.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: He snaps his fingers on the word 'that'. As he does so, the candle flames suddenly shine unnaturally bright, bathing the scene in a hellish red glow.NodeContext: He snaps his fingers on the word 'that'. As he does so, the candle flames suddenly shine unnaturally bright, bathing the scene in a hellish red glow.

47.speaker: Raphael
47.text: I could fix it all like that.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: He snaps his fingers on the word 'that'. As he does so, the candle flames suddenly shine unnaturally bright, bathing the scene in a hellish red glow.NodeContext: He snaps his fingers on the word 'that'. As he does so, the candle flames suddenly shine unnaturally bright, bathing the scene in a hellish red glow.

9.speaker: Player
9.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I'll do anything to get rid of the tadpole.
42.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

23.speaker: Raphael
23.text: Oh. That's disappointing. I prefer it when my clients put up a fight...
23.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

0.speaker: Raphael
0.text: ...only to realise victory was never an option.
0.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

77.speaker: Raphael
77.text: Try to cure yourself. Shop around - beg, borrow, and steal. Exhaust every possibility until none are left.
77.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

93.speaker: Raphael
93.text: And when hope has been whittled down to the very marrow of despair - that's when you'll come knocking on my door.
93.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

7.speaker: Raphael
7.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: That's what separates us from the devils, soldier. They think our greatest strength is a weakness.
38.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

75.speaker: Karlach
75.text: That's what separates us from the devils, soldier. They think our greatest strength is a weakness.
75.context: NodeContext: Disgust with Raphael, but proud of being a hopeful mortal.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: And if I do want to take this deal - how would I find you?

90.speaker: Player
90.text: And if I do want to take this deal - how would I find you?

55.speaker: Raphael
55.text: I'll be around. Watching you squirm like a tadpole through a nice juicy brain.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I'll have the last laugh in the end.

94.speaker: Raphael
94.text: I've always wondered what a laughing mind flayer sounds like.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Take me back. After that, I never want to see you again.

96.speaker: Raphael
96.text: By all means bite the hand that feeds you while you still have teeth.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I'll rip out your mocking tongue.

44.speaker: Raphael
44.text: Ah, yes. The tongue. Yet another piece of pleasurable anatomy you'll soon have to do without.

82.speaker: Raphael
82.text: All those pretty little symptoms - sundering skin, dissolving guts - they haven't manifested yet, have they?

74.speaker: Raphael
74.text: One might say you're a paragon of luck.

53.speaker: Raphael
53.text: I'll be there when it runs out.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I need to think this over.

54.speaker: Raphael
54.text: Take all the time you need - but make up your mind before you're counting down with tentacles.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: You're mad if you think I'll make a deal with a devil.

49.speaker: Raphael
49.text: And what is madness but a denial of reality?

51.speaker: Raphael
51.text: Still, I've a feeling you'll change your mind. Before it's changed for you...

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Then fix it - or die at my hand.

81.speaker: Raphael
81.text: Yes... I like it when my clients put up a fight...

97.speaker: Player
97.text: I serve an oath, not a devil. My honour is not for sale.

45.speaker: Raphael
45.text: Your oath is in tatters, paladin. You abandoned your honour as soon as it became inconvenient.

34.speaker: Raphael
34.text: But the darkness won't save you anymore than the light could. You'll realise that in time.

76.speaker: Raphael
76.text: Everything is for sale. And you'd do well to sell while your stock has value - in desperate times, the price of honour plummets.

56.speaker: Raphael
56.text: Perhaps you haven't yet realised how desperate these times are. You will.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Level your weapon at the creature.

84.speaker: Raphael
84.text: My, aren't you a nervous one! I assure you I'm here to help, not harm.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: What makes you think I need saving?

87.speaker: Raphael
87.text: Come now. Why play hard to get when you're in deep over your tadpoled head?

91.speaker: Raphael
91.text: Because my compassion is boundless. I stride among the needy, giving comfort where I can.

6.speaker: Raphael
6.text: And you're in dire need. One skull, two tenants, and no solution in sight.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I don't care what you are - I care what you want.

64.speaker: Raphael
64.text: Oh, a mere trifle. How dear is one's soul, really?

61.speaker: Raphael
61.text: A rhetorical question, of course, but let me venture an answer.

69.speaker: Raphael
69.text: It's worth very little with a tadpole in your head.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Can you be more specific than 'somewhere'?
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.NodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.

30.speaker: Player
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.NodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.

46.speaker: Raphael
46.text: And deny you the honour of my hospitality?

43.speaker: Player
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.NodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.

5.speaker: Raphael
5.text: Tut tut. No need for that crude cutlery of yours. As you can see, I'm amply provisioned.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.NodeContext: He gestures across the table: plenty of silverware present.

2.speaker: Raphael
2.text: This is the House of Hope. Where the tired come to rest, and the famished come to feed - lavishly.
